remarks: Value of the set of faithful functors between two categories. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Jan-2017.)
statement:
isfth.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
isfth $p |- ( F ( C Faith D ) G <-> ( F ( C Func D ) G /\ A. x e. B A. y e. B Fun `' ( x G y ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
